crnrstn_element.crnrstn_description: Closes a previously opened MySQLi database connection.
crnrstn_element.crnrstn_returnedvalue: Returns TRUE on success or FALSE on failure.

crnrstn_techspecscontent.crnrstn_techspec: It is recommended that you upgrade to the latest version of PHP to take advantage of the latest gains in security and processing efficiency.
Currently tested on an Ubuntu Server 16.04 running PHP 7.0.22 and Redhat Linux running PHP 5.5.38.

crnrstn_parameter.crnrstn_paramdefinition: The MySQLi database connection handle that was returned by $oCRNRSTN_ENV->oMYSQLI_CONN_MGR->returnConnection().
